org.matrix.olm

Class OlmMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.olm.OlmMessage

  • public class OlmMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Message class used in Olm sessions to contain the encrypted data.
    See OlmSession.decryptMessage(OlmMessage) and OlmSession.encryptMessage(String).
    Detailed implementation guide is available at Implementing End-to-End Encryption in Matrix clients.
